text: Timothy S. Jost is a professor at the Washington and Lee University School of Law. He is the co-author of Health Law, a widely used textbook. His analysis and arguments regarding the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (ACA, Obamacare) have been widely quoted. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Washington and Lee University School of Law faculty Category:Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act Category:Health law in the United States
title: Timothy Jost
